mapper.select: SELECT ser_id AS serId, ser_name AS serName, ser_birth AS serBirth, ser_mobile AS serMobile, ser_email AS serEmail, ser_cum_coefficient AS serCumCoefficient, ser_cum_time AS serCumTime, ser_sns AS serSns FROM Servant WHERE ser_id = #{serId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Servant ser_id AS serId, ser_name AS serName, ser_birth AS serBirth, ser_gender AS serGender, ser_mobile AS serMobile, ser_email AS serEmail, ser_sns AS serSns VALUES #{serId}, #{serName}, #{serBirth}, #{serGender}, #{serMobile}, #{serEmail}, #{serSns}
